author: Written by Admin
title: Meet-up with Samy Chaffai
excerpt: On 29th of January 2020, we had the honor to host Samy Chaffai from 'ti3leh' Youtube Channel in our series of Meetups with successful Digital Content Creators from Youtube, and Instagram. Samy shared with us his Content Creation path and his best practices on how to reach his goals. Technics of storytelling, editing and reaching potential viewers were shared. This session was inspirational and motivational to our #seed project participants to launch their own Youtube channel.
body: On 29th of January 2020, we had the honor to host Samy Chaffai from 'Ti3leh' Youtube Channel in our series of Meetups with successful Digital Content Creators from Youtube, and Instagram. Samy shared with us his Content Creation path and his best practices on how to reach his goals. Technics of storytelling, editing and reaching potential viewers were shared. This session was inspirational and motivational to our #seed project participants to launch their own Youtube channel.

author: Written by Admin
title: Photography Training
excerpt: Seed's Social Project 'Open Space for Digital Content Creators' was officially launched on the 21st of December where our 15 participants received new skills around Photography during a two days' training. This project aims to train youth aged between 17 and 24 years old from regions such as Douar Hicher, Mourouj, Mnihla, El Zahra, etc. on Photography, Videography, Editing, etc. to help them improve their capacities and publish their digital contents on social media. The project is implemented with the support of The U.S.-Middle East Partnership Initiative (MEPI). Thank you Nawress for delivering this training. #Seed #MEPI #IREX
body: Seed's Social Project 'Open Space for Digital Content Creators' was officially launched on the 21st of December where our 15 participants received new skills around Photography during a two days' training. This project aims to train youth aged between 17 and 24 years old from regions such as Douar Hicher, Mourouj, Mnihla, El Zahra, etc. on Photography, Videography, Editing, etc. to help them improve their capacities and publish their digital contents on social media. The project is implemented with the support of The U.S.-Middle East Partnership Initiative (MEPI). Thank you Nawress for delivering this training. #Seed #MEPI #IREX

author: Written by Admin
title: Videography Training
excerpt: On the 25th of January 2020, we had the pleasure today to train our young future digital content creators on videography and how to shoot long take (Plan de séquence). In a short amount of time, they shot some creative ideas that will be shared here soon. Thank you Aya Chriki for being our trainer for this session.
body: On the 25th of January 2020, we had the pleasure today to train our young future digital content creators on videography and how to shoot long take (Plan de séquence). In a short amount of time, they shot some creative ideas that will be shared here soon. Thank you Aya Chriki for being our trainer for this session.

author: Written by Admin
title: Editing Training
excerpt: A training on video editing was held during the weekend of 15th and 16th of February in #Seed's space for Digital Content Creators. Project participants were presented to the basic technics of editing on Premiere pro software. They edited a video clip and made a trailer to Forrest Gump movie. Very special thanks to @Ghassen Jeribi for delivering this training.
body: A training on video editing was held during the weekend of 15th and 16th of February in #Seed's space for Digital Content Creators. Project participants were presented to the basic technics of editing on Premiere pro software. They edited a video clip and made a trailer to Forrest Gump movie. Very special thanks to @Ghassen Jeribi for delivering this training.

author: Written by Admin
title: Digital Marketing Training
excerpt: On the 22nd of February, #Seed has organized a training on Digital Marketing for the participants of its social project 'Open Space for Digital Content Creators'. Our trainer, Makrem Dhifalli, gave generous advice around how to define your audience and what are the right steps to reach them. Project participants are in the phase of filming their first content that will be shared later on their Youtube channels and other platforms.
body: On the 22nd of February, #Seed has organized a training on Digital Marketing for the participants of its social project 'Open Space for Digital Content Creators'. Our trainer, Makrem Dhifalli, gave generous advice around how to define your audience and what are the right steps to reach them. Project participants are in the phase of filming their first content that will be shared later on their Youtube channels and other platforms.

author: Written by Admin
title: Participants of the Social Project
excerpt: Project participants come from different areas in Grand Tunis such as Douar Hicher, Mourouj, Zahra, Mnihla, etc. Their age is between 17 and 24 years old. They were selected through an open call for participants that was launched prior to the project initiation. They all share their passion to content creation and aim to be the next generation of Digital Content Creators in Tunisia.
body: Project participants come from different areas in Grand Tunis such as Douar Hicher, Mourouj, Zahra, Mnihla, etc. Their age is between 17 and 24 years old. They were selected through an open call for participants that was launched prior to the project initiation. They all share their passion to content creation and aim to be the next generation of Digital Content Creators in Tunisia.
